arts.ttl: What does the future hold for Girona after their sudden rise?
arts.sum: Spanish minnows Girona made it into the Champions League for the first time last season. What does the future hold for the club, who were bought by City Football Group in 2017?

arts.ttl: Girona vs Slovan Bratislava: Preview, predictions and lineups
arts.sum: Two Champions League novices do battle on Matchday 3 of the league phase as La Liga's Girona take on Slovakian giants Slovan Bratislava. Girona's Matchday 2 clash with the Dutch side was a belter, with the Spaniards succumbing 3-2 following a topsy-turvy affair which boasted own goals, saved penalties at both ends, and a rare Donny van de Beek strike.
Aidan Perkins has cast his eye on all 18 Champions League games during Matchday Three this week and has a score prediction for each game.

Girona have won only one of their last eight in all competitions following their 1-0 loss to Real Sociedad at the weekend. Slovan Bratislava have lost only three matches this season, though two of th...
